Package edu.bu.met.cs665.bev.controller

Interface BeverageControllerObserver

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    GuiApp, Main
    public interface BeverageControllerObserver
    BeverageControllerObservers can receive notifications from BeverageControllers when various events occur.
    Author:
    Christopher D. Canfield

    • Method Summary

      Modifier and Type Method Description
      void onOrderCompleted​(BeverageController controller, CompletedOrder completedOrder)
      Called when the observed controller completes an order.
      void onOrderFailed​(BeverageController controller, Throwable throwable)
      Called when the order has failed.
      void onOrderReceived​(BeverageController controller, BeverageOrder order)
      Called when the observed controller receives an order.
      void onStateChanged​(BeverageController controller, BeverageController.State newState)
      Called when the observed controller's state changes.
      void onTooManyCondimentsOrdered​(BeverageController controller, String message)
      Called when too many condiments have been ordered.

    • Method Detail

      • onStateChanged

        void onStateChanged​(BeverageController controller,
                    BeverageController.State newState)
        Called when the observed controller's state changes.
        Parameters:
        controller - the controller that had a change in state.
        newState - the new state of the controller.

      • onOrderReceived

        void onOrderReceived​(BeverageController controller,
                     BeverageOrder order)
        Called when the observed controller receives an order.
        Parameters:
        controller - the controller that received an order.
        order - the order that was received.

      • onTooManyCondimentsOrdered

        void onTooManyCondimentsOrdered​(BeverageController controller,
                                String message)
        Called when too many condiments have been ordered.
        Parameters:
        controller - the controller that received the order.
        message - a message that contains information about the order problem.

      • onOrderCompleted

        void onOrderCompleted​(BeverageController controller,
                      CompletedOrder completedOrder)
        Called when the observed controller completes an order. This may be called on a thread other than the main thread.
        Parameters:
        controller - the controller that completed an order.
        completedOrder - the completed order info.

      • onOrderFailed

        void onOrderFailed​(BeverageController controller,
                   Throwable throwable)
        Called when the order has failed. This may be called on a thread other the main thread.
        Parameters:
        controller - the controller that received the order.
        throwable - a throwable representing the failure.
